H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H4603.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H4604.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H2764.def: = long net hanging vertically in the water with floats at the upper edge and weights at the lower edge; ► drawn in by men working in boats or from shore; as the ends are drawn together to the boat or drawn ashore, fish are trapped in the area enclosed by the net; drawn in immediately after it has been spread out; ≈ associated with aggression and control

H5912.def: = man, also known as {L:Achar<SDBH:עָכָר>}; ◄ son of {L:Carmi<SDBH:כַּרְמִי>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► brought trouble over {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} by stealing from the plunder of {L:Jericho<SDBH:יְרִחֹו>}

H2067.def: = man, also known as {L:Zimri<SDBH:זִמְרִי>}; ◄ son of {L:Zerah<SDBH:זֶרַח>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► ancestor of {L:Achan<SDBH:עָכָן>}

H2226.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2734.def: = process by which humans gradually disappear from the face of the earth ◄ as if burnt away by fire

151.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H3405.def: = town; ◄ located northwest of the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}; territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first town conquered by {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} after they entered {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1008.def: = town and cult centre, also referred to as {L:Beth-Aven<SDBH:בֵּית אָוֶן>} or simply {L:Aven<SDBH:אָוֶן>}; ◄ territory of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}, near the border of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H7270.def: literally: to cause to move about; hence: = causative action by which humans teach young children to walk; ≈ used metaphorically about God teaching his people how to live

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H4592.def: = small quantity of objects or substance

H3021.def: = action by which humans are engaged in laborious activity which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

= human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H7291.def: = action by which humans go behind (other) humans or animals, usually at an increased speed

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H7671.def: = location from where stones are extracted

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H4549.def: = process by which substances become soft, ◄ often as a result of  a higher temperature

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H7167.def: = causative action by which humans or animals rip apart the human body or an inanimate object, either in part of entirely; usually with their hands

H8071.def: = a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose-fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6083.def: = the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}
